titles.title: Department of Veterans Affairs Reorganization Act of 2002
To amend title 38, United States Code, to establish a new Assistant Secretary to perform operations, preparedness, security and law enforcement functions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 4/24/2002--Introduced. Department of Veterans Affairs Reorganization Act of 2002 - Increases from six to seven the number of authorized Assistant Secretaries of the Department of Veterans Affairs and adds Department operations, preparedness, security, and law enforcement to their required functions.
